content: चित्रक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Bright, lovely, agreeable. {@--2@} Brave, powerful. --कः {@--1@} A painter. {@--2@} A tiger in general. {@--3@} A small hunting leopard. {@--4@} <ab>N.</ab> of a tree. --कं {@--1@} A sectarial mark on the forehead. {@--2@} A particular manner of fighting. {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of a wood near the mountain Raivataka.
